link.title: RSU 23 - School Closures
link.script:
(function(){/*
Copyright The Closure Library Authors. SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 */ /*

Copyright 2013 Google LLC. SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 */ /*
Copyright 2020 Google LLC. SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 */ /*
Copyright 2005 Google LLC. SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 */ var b=function(){this.c=""};b.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeScript{"+this.c+"}"};b.prototype.a=function(a){this.c=a};(new b).a("");var c=function(){this.g=""};c.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeStyle{"+this.g+"}"};c.prototype.a=function(a){this.g=a};(new c).a("");var d=function(){this.f=""};d.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeStyleSheet{"+this.f+"}"};d.prototype.a=function(a){this.f=a};(new d).a("");var e=function(){this.b=""};e.prototype.toString=function(){return"SafeHtml{"+this.b+"}"};e.prototype.a=function(a){this.b=a};(new e).a("");(new e).a("");(new e).a("
");}).call(this);

div.style: background-size: cover; background-position: center center; background-image: url(https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/w8IHZ08oYX3xHyOrLRXAepXhGgGih5DrCbhmn31xIuVuz8KQO7S4TTNGNaBiUVXVlCS3IQQ=w16383);

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OwsYgb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 50px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: These are challenging times and RSU 23 faculty and staff are here to support you where and when we can. Clear and accurate RSU 23 communication continues to be our highest priority. This website will help us to disseminate resources and supports ranging from CDC health bulletins to learning opportunities designed to keep your children engaged at home. This website will be updated regularly throughout the school closure, providing the RSU 23 School Community with the information, resources and supports necessary to venture forth.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Learning is what we do best and RSU 23 faculty will be reaching out to students via phone, email, or letter by the end of the day Wednesday, March 18, 2020, to reconnect and begin providing support and information for remote learning.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: As always, don't hesitate to reach out with questions or concerns.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
